links: Reinhard Zumkeller, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
mathematica: a=5; t=Array[Prime,123]; Drop[t,a]-Drop[t,-a] (* _Vladimir Joseph Stephan Orlovsky_, Aug 13 2009 *)Last[#]-First[#]&/@Partition[Prime[Range[80]],6,1] (* _Harvey P. Dale_, Jul 11 2014 *)
prog: (PARI) A031167(n) = prime(n+5)-prime(n)(MAGMA) [NthPrime(n+5)-NthPrime(n): n in [1..100] ]; // _Vincenzo Librandi_, Apr 23 2011(Haskell)a031167 n = a031167_list !! (n-1)a031167_list = zipWith (-) (drop 5 a000040_list) a000040_list-- _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Aug 23 2015
